nodes.text: Sleheyron was a planet[source?] located in the galaxy's Hutt Space region, in grid square S-10 on the Standard Galactic Grid, that was connected to Kessel, Klatooine, Nimban, and Varl by a hyperspace route. Controlled by the Hutt Clan, it was the homeworld of Hutt crime lord Ziro, who was covered in colorful tattoos indicating his connection to Sleheyron.

Sleheyron was first mentioned in the new Star Wars canon in Ultimate Star Wars, a reference book written by Patricia Barr, Adam Bray, Daniel Wallace, and Ryder Windham and released on April 28, 2015. It was originally created for Star Wars: Knights of the Old Republic, a Star Wars Legends roleplaying game developed by BioWare and released on July 15, 2003.
